articles.description: Between this conversion and a potential one five years down, Vodafone Idea needs to find more cash. Large amounts of it.
articles.content: What Vodafone Idea needs is for its promoters to cough up cash, invest in network and technology, hold on to subscribers and prune less-profitable parts of the business even while convincing banks, a… [+1168 chars]

articles.title: Paytm to shut Canada app to focus all resources on India business - Mint
articles.description: Paytm said the development has no impact on the Canada-based Paytm Labs or Paytm India business or revenue.
articles.content: Paytm on Friday has announced to shut its Canada Business-to-Consumer (B2C) app to focus all its resources on the India business. The development comes two months after a dismal debut on the exchange… [+1648 chars]

articles.title: Why AGS Transact Tech dropped 68% in unlisted market - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: Shares of AGS Transact Technologies Ltd are down nearly 68% in the unlisted market from its recent peak of Rs 550 a share hit in October 2021. Currently it is quoting at Rs 185-195 per share, a dealer said.
